Uses of Class
nl.fw.yapool.sql.NamedParameterStatement

  • Packages that use NamedParameterStatement 
    Package Description
    nl.fw.yapool.sql  

    • Uses of NamedParameterStatement in nl.fw.yapool.sql

      Fields in nl.fw.yapool.sql declared as NamedParameterStatement 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      NamedParameterStatement DbConn.nps
      A named prepared statement, set when DbConn.setNQuery(String) is called.
      Methods in nl.fw.yapool.sql that return NamedParameterStatement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NamedParameterStatement SimpleQueryBuilder.createNamedQuery(Connection c, String queryName)
      Creates a named prepared statement for the connection.
      NamedParameterStatement IQueryBuilder.createNamedQuery(Connection c, String queryName)
      Creates a named parameter statement for the connection.
      NamedParameterStatement SimpleQueryCache.getNamedQuery(Connection c, String queryName) 
      NamedParameterStatement IQueryCache.getNamedQuery(Connection c, String queryName)
      Creates a named parameter statement for the connection or re-uses one from cache.
      NamedParameterStatement DbConn.setNQuery(String query)
      Calls DbConn.setNQuery(String, int) with autoGeneratedKeys ignored.
      NamedParameterStatement DbConn.setNQuery(String query, int autoGeneratedKeys)
      Same as DbConn.setQuery(String, int), but this time for a named query (sets DbConn.nps instead of DbConn.ps).
      Methods in nl.fw.yapool.sql with parameters of type NamedParameterStatement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void DbConn.close(NamedParameterStatement s)
      Closes a statement (checks for null-value), logs any error as warning using closeLogger.
